cleanup_smart_rules = ['tr_Shipping Postal Code_Billing Currency_20220721_130937']

    def test_sr_dynamic_cond(self, fw_api, ui_login, smart_rules_dynamic_conditions, txn_samples, cleanup_smart_rules):
        # Generate unique test name with timestamp
        UNIQUE_INDENTIFIER = f"{smart_rules_dynamic_conditions['field']}_{self._get_dynamic_velocity_abbrev(smart_rules_dynamic_conditions['velocity_type'])}"
        TEST_RULE_NAME = f"tr_{UNIQUE_INDENTIFIER}_{self.current_timestr}"
        repeat_txn = range(smart_rules_dynamic_conditions['repeat_txn'])
        allure.dynamic.title(f"Smart Rules Dynamic Field: {smart_rules_dynamic_conditions['field']}-{smart_rules_dynamic_conditions['velocity_type']}")
    
        # Post Test Cleanup
        cleanup_smart_rules.append(TEST_RULE_NAME)
    
        # Navigate to Smart Rules
        side_navbar = SideBarPage(self.driver)
        side_navbar.expand_rules_console()
        with url_change(side_navbar, fail_message="Failed to navigate to Smart Rules."):
            smartrules_page = side_navbar.click_smart_rules()
    
        # Create Smart Rule
        create_rule_page = smartrules_page.click_add_new_rule()
        create_rule_page.tick_active_rule_upon_save()
        create_rule_page.enter_name(TEST_RULE_NAME)
        create_rule_page.select_static_condition_field(smart_rules_dynamic_conditions['field'])
        create_rule_page.select_static_condition_opt(smart_rules_dynamic_conditions['operator'])
        create_rule_page.select_static_condition_value(smart_rules_dynamic_conditions['value_option'])
        create_rule_page.enter_static_condition_value(smart_rules_dynamic_conditions['value'])
        create_rule_page.select_decision('block')
        create_rule_page.click_add_dynamic_condition()
        create_rule_page.select_dynamic_cond_velocity_type(smart_rules_dynamic_conditions['velocity_type'])
        create_rule_page.select_dynamic_cond_threshold_currency(smart_rules_dynamic_conditions['currency'])
        create_rule_page.enter_dynamic_cond_threshold(smart_rules_dynamic_conditions['threshold'])
        create_rule_page.enter_dynamic_cond_duration(1)  # days
        create_rule_page.select_dynamic_cond_group_by(smart_rules_dynamic_conditions['field'])
        create_rule_page.enter_comments('test automation rule (delete me)')
        smartrules_page = create_rule_page.click_confirm()
    
        # Check Smart Rule
        smartrules_page.enter_rules_filter_name(TEST_RULE_NAME)
        rule = smartrules_page.get_first_rule()
        assert rule.get_name() == TEST_RULE_NAME
    
        # Send & verify Vanilla transaction
        vanilla_txn = txn_samples.VANILLA
        for _ in repeat_txn:
            vanilla_resp = fw_api.send_transaction(vanilla_txn)
            assert_txn_matches_decision(vanilla_resp, 'score', TEST_RULE_NAME)  # vanilla transaction should not be blocked by rule
    
        # Send Test transaction
        transaction = copy.deepcopy(txn_samples.BASE_TEST)
        transaction.update({
            'transaction_id_ext': f'tt_{UNIQUE_INDENTIFIER}',
            'transaction_channel': self.get_random_txn_channel()
        })
        transaction.update(smart_rules_dynamic_conditions['txn_update'])
        test_resp = []
        for _ in repeat_txn:
            test_resp.append(fw_api.send_transaction(transaction))
    
        # Verify expected transaction decisions
        # All transactions should go through except the last one
        for i, resp in enumerate(test_resp):
            if i == (len(test_resp) - 1):
                assert_txn_matches_decision(resp, 'block', TEST_RULE_NAME)
                continue
>           assert_txn_matches_decision(resp, 'score', TEST_RULE_NAME)
